forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with light rain early. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
